report.title: Resource summary for trait
report.description: Breakdown of resources in a trait with species and SQI scores
report.query: with recursive cte_query as ( select t.id, t.term, t.term as chain, t.meaning_id, null::integer as parent_id, 0 as sequence from cache_termlists_terms t where t.id=#trait_id# and t.preferred=true union all select t.id, t.term, q.chain || ' >> ' || q.term, t.meaning_id, t.parent_id, q.sequence+1 from cache_termlists_terms t join cte_query q on q.id=t.parent_id left join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values sat on sat.int_value=t.id and sat.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=20 and sat.deleted=false where t.preferred=true and t.term not like '%(NIU)' --exclude SATs and sat.id is null ) select #columns# from cte_query q left join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values v on v.int_value=q.id and v.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (15,16,17) and v.deleted=false left join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=v.taxa_taxon_list_id left join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values rscv on rscv.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and rscv.deleted=false and rscv.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=24 left join cache_termlists_terms tc on tc.meaning_id=q.meaning_id and tc.preferred=false
